statements: SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type, quantity_in_stock FROM equipment_inventory;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity_in_stock FROM equipment_inventory WHERE equipment_type = 'Computer';
SELECT equipment_name, quantity_in_stock FROM equipment_inventory WHERE quantity_in_stock > 10;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity_in_stock FROM equipment_inventory ORDER BY quantity_in_stock DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity_in_stock FROM equipment_inventory WHERE equipment_type='Computer' ORDER BY quantity_in_stock DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory WHERE quantity_in_stock > 10 ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type, quantity_in_stock FROM equipment_inventory WHERE equipment_type='Printer' AND quantity_in_stock < 5;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM equipment_inventory WHERE quantity_in_stock = 0;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity_in_stock FROM equipment_inventory WHERE quantity_in_stock BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY quantity_in_stock ASC;
SELECT * FROM camera_inventory ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT brand, model, resolution FROM camera_inventory WHERE brand = 'Canon' AND quantity > 0;
SELECT model, price, quantity FROM camera_inventory WHERE price < 1000 ORDER BY model ASC;
SELECT brand, model, quantity FROM camera_inventory WHERE brand IN ('Nikon', 'Sony') AND quantity > 5;
SELECT * FROM lens_inventory ORDER BY brand ASC, price DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM camera_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT brand, model, price FROM camera_inventory WHERE brand = 'Canon' ORDER BY model ASC
SELECT brand, model, resolution, price FROM camera_inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT lens_id, brand, max_aperture, quantity FROM lens_inventory WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY max_aperture DESC
SELECT brand, model, resolution, price FROM camera_inventory WHERE brand = 'Nikon' AND price > 800 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT * FROM Camera;
SELECT brand, model, price FROM Camera WHERE megapixels > 20;
SELECT model, brand FROM Lens ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT brand, power_watts FROM LightingAccessory WHERE price < 100;
SELECT * FROM Camera JOIN Lens ON Camera.camera_id = Lens.lens_id;
SELECT * FROM Camera WHERE brand = 'Nikon';
SELECT brand, model, price FROM Lens WHERE price > 500;
SELECT lens_id, brand, focal_length_mm FROM Lens ORDER BY focal_length_mm DESC;
SELECT * FROM Camera JOIN Lens ON Camera.camera_id = Lens.lens_id;
SELECT * FROM LightingAccessory WHERE type = 'LED' AND power_watts >= 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM cameras;
SELECT brand, model, megapixels FROM cameras WHERE brand='Canon';
SELECT lens_id, brand, focal_length FROM lenses ORDER BY focal_length DESC;
SELECT * FROM lighting_accessories WHERE color_temperature < 5000;
SELECT inventory_id, equipment_type, quantity FROM equipment_inventory WHERE available=true ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM cameras WHERE brand = 'Canon';
SELECT brand, model, megapixels FROM cameras ORDER BY megapixels DESC;
SELECT brand, model, lens_mount FROM cameras WHERE megapixels > 20 ORDER BY brand ASC;
SELECT * FROM lenses WHERE aperture >= 2.8 AND lens_type = 'Prime Lens';
SELECT accessory_id, type, brand, power_rating FROM lighting_accessories WHERE color_temperature < 5000 ORDER BY power_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM photographers;
SELECT brand, model, resolution FROM cameras WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT accessory_id, brand, price FROM lighting_accessories ORDER BY brand DESC;
SELECT photographer_id, name, age, gender, experience_years FROM photographers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT shoot_id, date, photographer_id, camera_id, lens_id, accessory_id FROM photo_shoots WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM photo_shoots WHERE photographer_id = 1;
SELECT brand, model, price FROM cameras WHERE resolution > 20 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT type FROM lighting_accessories;
SELECT photographer_id, COUNT(shoot_id) AS num_shoots FROM photo_shoots GROUP BY photographer_id;

SELECT p.name AS photographer_name, c.brand AS camera_brand, l.brand AS lens_brand FROM photographers p JOIN cameras c ON p.photographer_id = c.camera_id JOIN lenses l ON p.photographer_id = l.lens_id;
